INSERT INTO DK_ORDER_RESULT_DKL (SIGN_OBJ_ID, NUM1, NUM2, NUM3, NUM4, NUM_FAIL, TOTAL_NUM, SUM_AMT, AVG_AMT, MAX_AMT, MIN_AMT) SELECT OUTTER_A.SIGN_OBJ_ID, NVL(NUM1,0) AS NUM1, NVL(NUM2,0) AS NUM2, NVL(NUM3,0) AS NUM3, NVL(NUM4,0) AS NUM4, TOTAL_NUM-NVL(NUM1,0)-NVL(NUM2,0)-NVL(NUM3,0)-NVL(NUM4,0) AS NUM_FAIL, TOTAL_NUM, SUM_AMT, AVG_AMT, MAX_AMT, MIN_AMT FROM (WITH INNER_A AS ( SELECT SUM(BILL_TOTAL_AMT)/COUNT(1) AS BILL_TOTAL_AMT,SIGN_OBJ_ID,MER_BILL_NO FROM DK_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE SIGN_OBJ_ID IS NOT NULL AND MER_BILL_NO IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(MER_BILL_DATE,0,4)=2017 GROUP BY SIGN_OBJ_ID,MER_BILL_NO ) SELECT SUM(BILL_TOTAL_AMT) AS SUM_AMT, AVG(BILL_TOTAL_AMT) AS AVG_AMT, MAX(BILL_TOTAL_AMT) AS MAX_AMT, MIN(BILL_TOTAL_AMT) AS MIN_AMT, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_NUM, SIGN_OBJ_ID FROM INNER_A GROUP BY SIGN_OBJ_ID )OUTTER_A LEFT JOIN
( WITH INNER_B AS (SELECT COUNT(1) AS NUM,SIGN_OBJ_ID,MER_BILL_NO FROM DK_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE SIGN_OBJ_ID IS NOT NULL AND MER_BILL_NO IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(MER_BILL_DATE,0,4)=2017 GROUP BY SIGN_OBJ_ID,MER_BILL_NO) SELECT SIGN_OBJ_ID, SUM(CASE WHEN NUM=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NUM1, SUM(CASE WHEN NUM=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NUM2, SUM(CASE WHEN NUM=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NUM3, SUM(CASE WHEN NUM>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NUM4 FROM INNER_B GROUP BY SIGN_OBJ_ID ) OUTTER_B
ON OUTTER_A.SIGN_OBJ_ID = OUTTER_B.SIGN_OBJ_ID
